docstring.long_description: Requires a CONNECT_DMM7510 block to create the connection.
docstring.short_description: Changes the measurement settings for the DMM7510.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The VISA address (requires the CONNECTION_DMM7510 block).

parameters.name: meas_range
parameters.description: The range to measure with (i.e. the maximum).

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of counts to average.

parameters.name: NPLC
parameters.description: The integration rate in number of clocks.
